frameDefinitions: A Cognizer carries out an approximate calculation or considers some Evidence so as to arrive at an approximate Value for some Feature of an Item.
An Agent causes a Patient to be affected, sometimes by a particular Means or by use of an Instrument.
A Cognizer has a piece of Content in their model of the world.

A Cognizer possesses knowledge about the workings, significance, or meaning of an idea or object, which we call Phenomenon, and is able to make predictions about the behavior or  occurrence of the Phenomenon.
Two (or more) people (the Parties, also encodable as Party_1 and Party_2) negotiate an agreement.
A person (the Cognizer) comes to believe something (the Content), sometimes after a process of reasoning.
frameExamples: Until 1971, dolphin mortality could be <t>estimated</t> only from analyses of vessels ' logbooks -- and the figures are probably underestimates. CNI
A professional dishwasher doesn't <t>do</t> dishes with a rag anymore!
Your boss is <t>aware</t> of your commitment.
I figured this out last week and now I really <t>understand</t> it.
So far , we have <t>agreed</t>to cede 100km of coastline to Kiribati . DNI
Based on the most recent census I have <t>concluded</t> that most Americans sleep too much.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual who considers evidence or performs calculations to arrive at an approximation.
The feature is a scalar property of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The position or area  on the <fen>Feature</fen> scale that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> concludes the <fen>Item</fen> occupies.
The entity that possesses the <fen>Feature</fen> whose <fen>Value</fen> the <fen>Cognizer</fen> seeks to approximate.
A proposition expressing the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s approximation of a <fen>Feature</fen>'s <fen>Value</fen>.
An open proposition for which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> seeks to approximate the <fen>Value</fen> of a variable.
The time period during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> forms the estimate of the <fen>Feature</fen>'s <fen>Value</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> forms their estimate.
This role identifies the act that the <fen>Agent</fen> performs intentionally.
The conscious entity, generally a person, that performs the intentional act that affects the <fen>Patient</fen>.
Patient is the entity acted on and that may, but need not, undergo a change.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally affects the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Agent</fen> performs the intentional act.

The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person whose awareness of phenomena is at question. With a target verb or adjective the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is generally expressed as an External Argument with the <fen>Content</fen> expressed as an Object or Complement.
The <fen>Content</fen> is the object of the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s awareness. <fen>Content</fen> can be expressed as a direct object or in a PP Complement.
Some verbs in this frame allow a <fen>Topic</fen> to be expressed in about-PPs.
<fen>Expressor</fen> is the body part that reveals the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s state to the observer.
The time interval during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is aware of the <fen>Content</fen>.
The sentient animate being who acquires new knowledge.
A state of affairs or dynamic system whose internal make-up and working the Cognizer comes to assimilate into their knowledge structure.
A part  of a person's cognitive-emotional faculties that is said to acquire knowledge.
This role indicates the when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> asssimilates the new knowledge.

The individual or individuals that form the more prominent (i.e.
agentive) party of the agreement, as compared with <fen>Party_2</fen>. That is,
<fen>Party_1</fen> is generally encoded as the External Argument of verbs, and
peripheral FEs that do not make reference to the event itself
generally make reference to <fen>Party_1</fen>. Thus <fen>Manner</fen> is construed to be that of <fen>Party_1</fen>, not necessarily that of <fen>Party_2</fen> or the group of <fen>Parties</fen> as a whole.

The semantically (and grammatically) less prominent participant (or
group of participants) in the agreement. It is generally encoded
within a prepositional phrase (e.g. headed by with).
An expression of the commitment made by the <fen>Parties</fen> .
<fen>Topic</fen> is a description of the domain covered.
The group of individuals portrayed as equally involved in making an agreement.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
Cognizer is the person who comes to believe something.
Words in this frame may occur with a PP headed by <ment>from</ment> which expresses the Evidence on which knowledge or belief is based:
With a target verb, the Content is usually expressed as a finite clausal Complement or an Object NP, and may sometimes be expressed by a PP:

Some verbs in this frame may occur with postverbal Topic expressions: They <t>found out</t> <fex name='Topic'>about us</fex>! More generally verbs in this frame may occur with quantificational nouns followed by Topic expressions:
An act performed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> which enables them to figure something out.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the text created by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to communicate that they came to believe a specified <fen>Content</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> discovers the <fen>Content</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> realizes the <fen>Content</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The government</fex> estimated the cost of meeting EC water standards at £3-4 billion.

In one march from 42 Street down to Washington Square Park, the crowds were
estimated <fex>in size</fex> from 125000 (NYPD estimate) to over 200000 (march organizers).
Sotheby 's have estimated its value <fex>at $10m-$14m</fex>.
I estimated <fex>the house</fex> at about 60-65% full.
At the time they estimated <fex>there to be as many as four million to the acre</fex>.
Then Sandia estimated <fex>how many people would die and be injured within the first year due to their radiation exposure</fex>.
The US Forest Service estimated <fex>last year</fex> that 45 million piñons have died so far in north-central New Mexico.
<fex>At the London School of Economics</fex> they estimated that China would have to spend 2% of gross. domestic product on higher. education for 15 years
A professional dishwasher does <fex>dishes</fex> one at a time.
<fex>Your boss</fex> is aware of your commitment.
Your boss is aware <fex>of your commitment</fex>.
Kim knows <fex>about first aid</fex>.
Bob's <fex>eyes</fex> were overly aware

Yet there is no evidence that Mr. Parrish was cognizant <fex>at the time of the signing
of the notes</fex> that the clauses in issue were present.
<fex>Sue</fex> grasped the essentials right away
You must grasp <fex>the complex relationship of all these subjects to each other</fex>
<fex>My heart</fex> grasped that reality immediately.
<fex>Yesterday</fex> the students finally grasped the meaning of the equation
On Monday, <fex>the airline</fex> reached a deal with the Canadian Auto Workers.
Mozilla Foundation has finally reached an agreement <fex>with America Online</fex>.
The US and Russia have agreed <fex>to share early warning data on missile launches</fex>.
Some types of alloy steel have been covered in the expiring <fex>trade</fex> agreement.
<fex>The US and Russia</fex> have agreed to cooperate in destroying surplus portable anti-aircraft missiles.
The town coucil members finally reached an agreement <fex>at midnight</fex>.
The town coucil members reached an agreement <fex>at the City Hall plenary session</fex>.
<fex>Sue</fex> realized that Bob was lost.
I have learned <fex>from experience</fex> that poison oak can be painful.
The President learned <fex>that the reporters were hungry</fex>.
The jury learned something terrible <fex>about the suspect</fex>.
<fex>A post-mortem examination</fex> was unable to ascertain the cause of death.
<fex>Back at the tailor's shop</fex>, I deduced that our murderer was not the owner of the kerchief.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Guidance Ministry for the information of high-ranking authorities
